name: Siren Head (fangame)
description:
Siren Head is a 40-foot-tall humanoid creature with a heavily emaciated, near-skeletal frame covered in dried, mummified flesh the color of rusty metal... AND ITS COMING AFTER YOU!

Siren Head, also called Lamp Head or whitehead, is a hostile cryptid and urban entity created by Trevor Henderson.

This is an unofficial fan made game,

all rights go to original creator Trevor Henderson.
